model.updateStrategy

Class NinjaStrategy<TDispMsg>

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.updateStrategy.NinjaStrategy<TDispMsg>
  • Type Parameters:
    TDispMsg - The message dispatched by dispatcher.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    IUpdateStrategy<TDispMsg>

    public class NinjaStrategy<TDispMsg>
extends java.lang.Object
implements IUpdateStrategy<TDispMsg>
    A concrete strategy class that implements IUpdateStategy. A ball will disappear every several ticks if takng this strategy.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Yuhui Tong, Haoyuan Yue
